title: Twitter experiences widespread disruption as users get error message trying to post
description: SAN FRANCISCO — Twitter experienced widespread problems Wednesday as users trying to post instead got error messages, the most serious disruption in the service since Elon Musk bought it in October.

title: Disney to cut 7,000 jobs as it slashes costs and reorganizes
description: Disney said Wednesday it is planning to reorganize into three segments.

title: Microsoft’s new Bing chatbot is fun but sometimes more cautious than ChatGPT
description: Microsoft has given a small group of people early access to the new version of its Bing search engine boosted with artificial intelligence courtesy of startup OpenAI, the maker of ChatGPT.
